Hello Everyone,
I want to send an email through a workflow, but i have 2 different links that i want to use randomly on my CTA. The CTA will redirect users to book a meeting with 2 sales persons, but i want to redirect the users to each URL associated to 1 of the sales person randomly. So that not all users land into one sales person, this way i can split audience targeting them randomly.

Is there a way like to create 2 different versions, and have each URL set in one of them, and then trigger any of the emails randomly to users ?

Or is there a HUBL function that enables me to generate the provided URLS randomly in the href="" attribute ?
